name: Franky Jean-Baptiste
bio: From Lagonave, Franky is a designer and maker at heart. He loves learning, and he loves architecture. When he is not at the iLab or studying, he is reading architecture books and hanging out at the beach. He attended Ceftech for architecture, where he discovered his love for technical drawing, especially plan drawings. Franky believes that iLab//Haiti is the first big vision for Haiti. He envisions that iLab // Haiti will grow to be a big company that will help Haiti to grow and move forward with technology. Franky is looking forward to being involved with iLab // Haiti for whole experience.
